author: aditya
msg: -- Protocol and transport factories now wrap around a single protocol/transport
- This is an analagous to the C++ change made in r31441

author: mcslee
msg: Summary: charlie you missed this one!

author: martin
msg: Thrift: Supported for file descriptor == 0 and cleanup error output
Thrift improperly initialized file descriptors to zero and treated 0 and an invalid value.  0 is a valid file descriptor.  Also, commented out error message on client disconnect for TThreadPoolServer

author: martin
msg: Thrift: Exception message is protected and accessible to derived classes.
Exception message is protected and accessible to derived classes.
